abstract.t: This document improves and extends the SIP Servlet API defined in [2]. The SIP Servlet API defines a mechanism, which enables theencapsulation of service logic in so called SIP Servlets on the top of the protocol stack of a SIP Server. A very important point, whichis not treated by [2] is the interoperability of services.[3] proposes a first approach to overcome this problem with a socalled root servlet. In this Internet draft we define a more genericmodel to perform a combination or interaction of SIP Servlets. This makes the servlet approach to a very powerful alternative also in UMTS to connect SIP Proxy and Service Logic.
